Changes.title: Role functionality
Changes.text: Added functionality to allow for RP-Only role to be added through typical reaction

Changes.title: Slash Command
Changes.text:
Added new slash command to bring up changelog
Added new slash command for **character** and **deletecharacter** commands

Changes.title: Framework Update
Changes.text: Updated framework to fit with V14 of Discord.js. This one may still have issues, so please reach out to staff if things stop working

Changes.title: Looking for group
Changes.text: Added functionality for looking for group reaction message. This can be found in the #misc-roles channel, the same place you can select your gender role

Changes.title: RPOnly
Changes.text:
Added functionality for RP Only reaction message. THis can be found in the #intro-to-character-making channel.
There is additional work to add these characters to our ever-growing database

Changes.title: Changelog Change
Changes.text: Updated bot to automatically update changelog on start. Go me. Begone random notifications

footer: I'll try to post one of these every time a new major feature is out, or when there is a major change to an existing. As always, you can type $help to get a list of commands, and $help <commandname> to get more specific information on a command
